column1: User: my email won't sync\nAssistant: Which GROSS product are you referring to?
User: my email won't sync\nAssistant: Try checking your IMAP settings in Rumblechirp.
User: Rumblechirp won't sync my inbox\nAssistant: Make sure your IMAP credentials are correct.
User: the drawing tool won't export\nAssistant: Which GROSS app are you using?
User: the drawing tool won't export\nAssistant: Try exporting again as SVG.
User: GuineaPigment won't export SVGs\nAssistant: Check that your document has valid paths.
User: the CMS is down\nAssistant: Restart the Verbiage++ service.
User: the CMS is down\nAssistant: Which product are you talking about?
User: it keeps crashing on startup\nAssistant: Can you tell me which GROSS product this is?
User: it keeps crashing on startup\nAssistant: This happens when the cache is corrupted.
